description: Assigns information about an ML configuration.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The membership ID of the member that is being configured.

parameters.name: defaultOutputLocation
parameters.description: The default Amazon S3 location where ML output is stored for the specified member. destination (dict) --- The Amazon S3 location where exported model artifacts are stored. Provides information about an Amazon S3 bucket and path. The Amazon S3 location URI. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service access role that is used to store the model artifacts.

nested_params.name: destination
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 location where exported model artifacts are stored.

nested_params.name: s3Destination
nested_params.description: Provides information about an Amazon S3 bucket and path.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service access role that is used to store the model artifacts.
